pullrequest.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

content.raw:
we already do a mock install of the `cmake` folder to `build/cmakeN`:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/c149694d8102b0a7f821c22a0b2a1403db6ce92a/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-95:114

this location works since the configured `-config.cmake` is located in `build`. We could do a similar thing for all the files in `share`, but the paths are a little different

~~~
./share/ignition/ignition-cmake1/codecheck/cpplint.py
./share/ignition/ignition-cmake1/codecheck/namespace_AZ.rule
./share/ignition/ignition-cmake1/codecheck/header_guard.rule
~~~

~~~
./lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/ignition-cmake1-config.cmake
./lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1
./lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/FindIgnCURL.cmake
./lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnCreateDocs.cmake
./lib/cmake/ignition-cmake1/cmake1/IgnUtils.cmake
~~~
